original:
I have the skill 'Tree Cut'.

I'll slice down any tree in the way
to ribbons.
translation:
I have the skill 'Tree Cut'.

I'll slice down any tree in the way
to ribbons.

original:
I have the skill 'Dig'.

I can easily travel through the earth
to find new locations.
translation:
I have the skill 'Dig'.

I can easily travel through the earth
to find new locations.

original:
I have the skill 'Dive'.

I can easily dive through the water
to find new locations.
translation:
I have the skill 'Dive'.

I can easily dive through the water
to find new locations.

original:
I don't have any skills, but I'll make
up for it in other ways.
translation:
I don't have any skills, but I'll make
up for it in other ways.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our HP and MP.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our HP and MP.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our EXP.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our EXP.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Attack.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Attack.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Defense.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Defense.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Speed.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Speed.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Friendship.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Friendship.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of effect they'll have.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with Weapon-making.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of weapons it'll make.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with Weapon-making.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of weapons it'll make.

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with Armor-making.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of armor it'll make.
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed down...
Looks like it's got something to
do with Armor-making.
I look forward to seeing what kind
of armor it'll make.

original: Should I stop this job?
translation: Should I stop this job?

original:
Alright then. Guess I'll take a
short break.
translation:
Alright then. Guess I'll take a
short break.

original:
I see... Then I'll just continue
where I left off.
translation:
I see... Then I'll just continue
where I left off.

original: Should I start this job?
translation: Should I start this job?

original:
This DigiMeal is delicious!
I'm full of energy now!
translation:
This DigiMeal is delicious!
I'm full of energy now!

original:
That DigiMeal was fine.
I feel a bit better now.
translation:
That DigiMeal was fine.
I feel a bit better now.

original: Sorry, but I can't eat that.
translation: Sorry, but I can't eat that.

original:
Thanks, but I can't eat another 
bite.
translation:
Thanks, but I can't eat another 
bite.

original:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What's the name of the PC that
receives requests from Digimon?
translation:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What's the name of the PC that
receives requests from Digimon?

original: Quest PC
translation: Quest PC

original: Counter PC
translation: Counter PC

original:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!
translation:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!

original:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!
translation:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!

original:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What stage was Wisemon, again?
translation:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What stage was Wisemon, again?

original: Ultimate level
translation: Ultimate level

original: Mega level
translation: Mega level

original:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!
translation:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!

original:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!
translation:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!

original:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What's the Tamer rank below 
Silver?
translation:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
What's the Tamer rank below 
Silver?

original: Bronze Tamer, right?
translation: Bronze Tamer, right?

original: Gold Tamer, right?
translation: Gold Tamer, right?

original:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!
translation:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!

original:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!
translation:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!

original:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
Out of Monzaemon, Taomon,
Pandamon and Pukumon...
Which pair are of the same
Digivolution stage?
translation:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
Out of Monzaemon, Taomon,
Pandamon and Pukumon...
Which pair are of the same
Digivolution stage?

original: Pandamon and Pukumon
translation: Pandamon and Pukumon

original: Monzaemon and Taomon
translation: Monzaemon and Taomon

original:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!
translation:
Ah, yes, that's it!
Thanks for that!
I'll give you a gift as thanks.
Here you go!

original:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!
translation:
Hey wait, that's not right!
Please pay more attention!
And please be sure to become
a more adequate Tamer!

original:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
We both know I'm incredibly
beautiful,
But could you tell me how to 
become even more beautiful?
translation:
Hi, ^P.
Could you answer this for me?
We both know I'm incredibly
beautiful,
But could you tell me how to 
become even more beautiful?

original: Beauty is on the inside.
translation: Beauty is on the inside.

original: Shave those rough edges.
translation: Shave those rough edges.

original:
Yes, you're exactly right,
^P.
It's not just the outside, but I need
to work on the inside, as well.
That was exactly what I was
missing!
Thank you for opening my eyes,
^P!
translation:
Yes, you're exactly right,
^P.
It's not just the outside, but I need
to work on the inside, as well.
That was exactly what I was
missing!
Thank you for opening my eyes,
^P!

original:
.........
Hey wait a minute!
I don't get it at all!
Now I just feel annoyed!
You just don't understand a thing!
translation:
.........
Hey wait a minute!
I don't get it at all!
Now I just feel annoyed!
You just don't understand a thing!

original:
What is it, ^P?
Do you need me for something?
It's about time I took my
afternoon nap.
Lack of sleep isn't good for your
skin, you know?
If you get in the way of my beauty
sleep, you'll pay...!
translation:
What is it, ^P?
Do you need me for something?
It's about time I took my
afternoon nap.
Lack of sleep isn't good for your
skin, you know?
If you get in the way of my beauty
sleep, you'll pay...!

original:
Hey, ^P,
can you repeat after me?
"If its low calorie, then you can
eat as much as you want."
...What's that about, you ask?
That's every girl's fantasy.
"Just a little means low calorie."
Come on, just say it!
"Low may as well be no calorie!"
Alright, I know I'm blabbing.
I was just trying to convince 
myself, leave me alone!
translation:
Hey, ^P,
can you repeat after me?
"If its low calorie, then you can
eat as much as you want."
...What's that about, you ask?
That's every girl's fantasy.
"Just a little means low calorie."
Come on, just say it!
"Low may as well be no calorie!"
Alright, I know I'm blabbing.
I was just trying to convince 
myself, leave me alone!

original:
...Hey, ^P.

I asked you to bring one, so 
where's my souvenir?
Jeez... Don't you get it?
It's not about the souvenir.
It's about the feeling and gesture
that goes into getting one!
Did I contradict myself? I don't 
know what you're talking about.
translation:
...Hey, ^P.

I asked you to bring one, so 
where's my souvenir?
Jeez... Don't you get it?
It's not about the souvenir.
It's about the feeling and gesture
that goes into getting one!
Did I contradict myself? I don't 
know what you're talking about.

original:
Do you know the key to keeping
both strength and beauty?
It's simple.
It's all about putting in effort.
You need to feel an obligation
to maintain it.
It's not about preserving the
effort you put in,
It's about constantly working
on it each and every day.
Though that's not usually 
what anyone wants to hear.
translation:
Do you know the key to keeping
both strength and beauty?
It's simple.
It's all about putting in effort.
You need to feel an obligation
to maintain it.
It's not about preserving the
effort you put in,
It's about constantly working
on it each and every day.
Though that's not usually 
what anyone wants to hear.

original:
I don't have much interest
in jewellery.
After all, no matter how beautiful
the shine...
It'll always pale in comparison
to how much I glitter!♪
translation:
I don't have much interest
in jewellery.
After all, no matter how beautiful
the shine...
It'll always pale in comparison
to how much I glitter!♪

original:
Oh, ^P,
Did you want something?
I don't feel like talking today, so
come back some other time.
translation:
Oh, ^P,
Did you want something?
I don't feel like talking today, so
come back some other time.

original:
Ahhh... It's so boring here on
this Farm Island.
Hey, could we have a 
Communication Battle sometime?
translation:
Ahhh... It's so boring here on
this Farm Island.
Hey, could we have a 
Communication Battle sometime?

original:
Haaah...

It's simply a sin how beautiful
I am.
translation:
Haaah...

It's simply a sin how beautiful
I am.

original:
I only want the best things.

I'm being quite kind in saying that,
you know.
After all, my perfection can't be
compared to others.
I feel sorry for anyone who's
compared to me♪
translation:
I only want the best things.

I'm being quite kind in saying that,
you know.
After all, my perfection can't be
compared to others.
I feel sorry for anyone who's
compared to me♪

original:
Hey, ^P,
can we have an honest talk?
I'm not sure how I feel about that
fashion sense of yours.
Especially...
those pointless goggles, you know?
Look, you're my Tamer, after all.

If you're trying to make me look
like a fool, you'll be in for it!
translation:
Hey, ^P,
can we have an honest talk?
I'm not sure how I feel about that
fashion sense of yours.
Especially...
those pointless goggles, you know?
Look, you're my Tamer, after all.

If you're trying to make me look
like a fool, you'll be in for it!

original:
...Haaah...

I'm just not getting excited about
anything these days.
It's not about my HP or MP
gauges...
I'd be better if I had an 
'Excitement' gauge instead...
Maybe a 'Sweets' gauge, or a
'Charm' gauge,
Even a 'Motivation' gauge 
could be nice...
... A 'Weight' gauge?!
I don't need that!
Even if I did have one, I'd
never show you, got it?!
translation:
...Haaah...

I'm just not getting excited about
anything these days.
It's not about my HP or MP
gauges...
I'd be better if I had an 
'Excitement' gauge instead...
Maybe a 'Sweets' gauge, or a
'Charm' gauge,
Even a 'Motivation' gauge 
could be nice...
... A 'Weight' gauge?!
I don't need that!
Even if I did have one, I'd
never show you, got it?!

original:
Why is it I'm gaining levels,
I wonder?
I think its quite rude and
unnecessary.
After all, I'm perfect as I am!
I don't need levels♪
translation:
Why is it I'm gaining levels,
I wonder?
I think its quite rude and
unnecessary.
After all, I'm perfect as I am!
I don't need levels♪

original:
Hm? Fortune telling?
I don't believe in that stuff.
Of course, people are free to
believe what they want.
I don't have any need for such
things as Lucky Colors or Items.
After all, I'm a Lucky Item,
myself♪
translation:
Hm? Fortune telling?
I don't believe in that stuff.
Of course, people are free to
believe what they want.
I don't have any need for such
things as Lucky Colors or Items.
After all, I'm a Lucky Item,
myself♪

original:
Hey, ^P...
I'd like to ask you something...
What's the Real World like...?

...'Real'??
What's that suppose to mean?
I don't get it!
translation:
Hey, ^P...
I'd like to ask you something...
What's the Real World like...?

...'Real'??
What's that suppose to mean?
I don't get it!

original:
Hey, ^P?

Other than me, what kinds of
Digimon do you like?
Hm? You think this is a
strange question?
Well, if I included myself, then I'd
be the best one, wouldn't I?
That was obvious!
translation:
Hey, ^P?

Other than me, what kinds of
Digimon do you like?
Hm? You think this is a
strange question?
Well, if I included myself, then I'd
be the best one, wouldn't I?
That was obvious!

original:
I'm Agumon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
Dinosaur...? How rude!

I'm not anywhere close to being
related to some gross lizard!
translation:
I'm Agumon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
Dinosaur...? How rude!

I'm not anywhere close to being
related to some gross lizard!

original:
I'm Veemon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
You're 250 million years too early
to be training someone like me!
Instead, allow me to train you
thoroughly!
I'll make sure you turn into a
most appropriate Tamer!
You best be prepared!
translation:
I'm Veemon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
You're 250 million years too early
to be training someone like me!
Instead, allow me to train you
thoroughly!
I'll make sure you turn into a
most appropriate Tamer!
You best be prepared!

original:
I'm Guilmon, a dark dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
My beautiful claws are useful 
in battle, and for other things...
If you ever disappoint me...
I'll tear your heart out with them♪
translation:
I'm Guilmon, a dark dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
My beautiful claws are useful 
in battle, and for other things...
If you ever disappoint me...
I'll tear your heart out with them♪

original:
I'm Dorumon, a beast dragon 
type Mythical Beast 
species Digimon!

Digging holes is a simple matter
for these claws of mine.
Allow me to show you some
special places...♪
translation:
I'm Dorumon, a beast dragon 
type Mythical Beast 
species Digimon!

Digging holes is a simple matter
for these claws of mine.
Allow me to show you some
special places...♪

original:
I'm Patamon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon!
I may look cute, but truth is I'm
actually quite amazing♪
If you let you're guard down,
you're in for trouble!
translation:
I'm Patamon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon!
I may look cute, but truth is I'm
actually quite amazing♪
If you let you're guard down,
you're in for trouble!

original:
I'm Biyomon, a wing type
bird species Digimon!
I'm strong, wise and beautiful.
Everyone should bow before me!
translation:
I'm Biyomon, a wing type
bird species Digimon!
I'm strong, wise and beautiful.
Everyone should bow before me!

original:
I'm Palmon, a plant type
plant species Digimon!
Every rose has its thorns.
You'd best remember that♪
translation:
I'm Palmon, a plant type
plant species Digimon!
Every rose has its thorns.
You'd best remember that♪

original:
I'm Tentomon, a insect type
bug species Digimon!
I do so love the beauty of nature...
...As well as my own beauty♪
Though this Farm Island isn't
too bad, either.
translation:
I'm Tentomon, a insect type
bug species Digimon!
I do so love the beauty of nature...
...As well as my own beauty♪
Though this Farm Island isn't
too bad, either.

original:
I'm Gomamon, an ice water 
type beast species Digimon!
I'm really good at diving!
I can take you wherever your heart
desires♪
translation:
I'm Gomamon, an ice water 
type beast species Digimon!
I'm really good at diving!
I can take you wherever your heart
desires♪

original:
I'm Terriermon, an animal type
beast species Digimon!
I may look frail, but I'm actually
just very delicate...
...Not really!
I'm truthfully very strong!
Hurry and take me with you
when you wanna see my power!
translation:
I'm Terriermon, an animal type
beast species Digimon!
I may look frail, but I'm actually
just very delicate...
...Not really!
I'm truthfully very strong!
Hurry and take me with you
when you wanna see my power!

original:
I'm Renamon, a dark type
beast species Digimon!
No one can compare to my speed.

If you drag your feet, I'll catch
up to you, you know♪
translation:
I'm Renamon, a dark type
beast species Digimon!
No one can compare to my speed.

If you drag your feet, I'll catch
up to you, you know♪

original:
I'm Coronamon, a flame type
beast species Digimon!
I'll burn anyone with my fiery
techniques.
Don't be fooled by my cute
appearance...
Else you might get burned, too.
translation:
I'm Coronamon, a flame type
beast species Digimon!
I'll burn anyone with my fiery
techniques.
Don't be fooled by my cute
appearance...
Else you might get burned, too.

original:
I'm Lunamon, a ice water type
beast species Digimon!
While I specialize in water attacks,
I actually hate the cold!
What I live for is an exciting,
heated battle!♪
translation:
I'm Lunamon, a ice water type
beast species Digimon!
While I specialize in water attacks,
I actually hate the cold!
What I live for is an exciting,
heated battle!♪

original:
I'm Gatomon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon!
I hate uncleanliness, boredom
and alarm clocks.
...And of course, Tamers who
don't care for their Digimon♪
translation:
I'm Gatomon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon!
I hate uncleanliness, boredom
and alarm clocks.
...And of course, Tamers who
don't care for their Digimon♪

original:
I'm WarGreymon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

My only wish is to continue to
grow stronger!
Of course, I'm already beautiful
enough♪
translation:
I'm WarGreymon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

My only wish is to continue to
grow stronger!
Of course, I'm already beautiful
enough♪

original:
I'm MetalGarurumon, a metal
beast type 
beast species Digimon!

If all you care for is strength,
then I'm not for you.
Battles are all about strength,
speed and beauty♪
translation:
I'm MetalGarurumon, a metal
beast type 
beast species Digimon!

If all you care for is strength,
then I'm not for you.
Battles are all about strength,
speed and beauty♪

original:
I'm Gallantmon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

I'm going to become even more
strong and beautiful!
...No, that's not correct.
I MUST become as such.
That's the duty of a chosen one
such as myself♪
translation:
I'm Gallantmon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

I'm going to become even more
strong and beautiful!
...No, that's not correct.
I MUST become as such.
That's the duty of a chosen one
such as myself♪

original:
I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon!
We meet at last, ^P.
I've been waiting for you.
After all, you're the Tamer I need.
And you need me just as much♪
translation:
I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon!
We meet at last, ^P.
I've been waiting for you.
After all, you're the Tamer I need.
And you need me just as much♪

original:
I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

The S is for Sweet, the B is for
Beautiful, and the M...
...is for Marvelous!
...Just joking♪
translation:
I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

The S is for Sweet, the B is for
Beautiful, and the M...
...is for Marvelous!
...Just joking♪

original:
I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

I don't really need an introduction,
now do I?
There isn't a Tamer alive who
doesn't know about me!♪
translation:
I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

I don't really need an introduction,
now do I?
There isn't a Tamer alive who
doesn't know about me!♪

original:
I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

Of course, you can just call me 
Imperialdramon Paladin Mode.
translation:
I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon!

Of course, you can just call me 
Imperialdramon Paladin Mode.

original:
I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon!

Did you bring me all the way to
this Farm Island...
Just to dump me off because
you're disappointed in me?
translation:
I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon!

Did you bring me all the way to
this Farm Island...
Just to dump me off because
you're disappointed in me?

original:
^P? Who's that?
Never heard that name before.
Oh, that's your name?
...Hmph.
translation:
^P? Who's that?
Never heard that name before.
Oh, that's your name?
...Hmph.

original:
^P!
You've got a long way to go!
You've gotta figure out what
you wanna talk about!
translation:
^P!
You've got a long way to go!
You've gotta figure out what
you wanna talk about!

original:
You've been ignoring me a lot
lately.
It's about time you realise what
you're doing wrong, got it?
translation:
You've been ignoring me a lot
lately.
It's about time you realise what
you're doing wrong, got it?

original:
You're starting to become like a
real Tamer, ^P!
But it wouldn't feel right calling you
my Tamer just yet!
translation:
You're starting to become like a
real Tamer, ^P!
But it wouldn't feel right calling you
my Tamer just yet!

original:
Well, you're an okay person,
^P.
But I'm still not satisfied yet!
translation:
Well, you're an okay person,
^P.
But I'm still not satisfied yet!

original:
I'm glad you're my Tamer,
^P...
........

Were you even listening?!
I'm not gonna say it again, jeez!
...Idiot.
translation:
I'm glad you're my Tamer,
^P...
........

Were you even listening?!
I'm not gonna say it again, jeez!
...Idiot.

original:
^P, you've played this
game for total of about...
^0 hours and ^1 minutes.

It's not enough...
It's not NEARLY enough!
You're gonna have to hang out
with us a lot more!
translation:
^P, you've played this
game for total of about...
^0 hours and ^1 minutes.

It's not enough...
It's not NEARLY enough!
You're gonna have to hang out
with us a lot more!

original:
^P, you've currently
set about...
^0% of all DigiPlates.

Not like that's such a big deal,
anyway!
translation:
^P, you've currently
set about...
^0% of all DigiPlates.

Not like that's such a big deal,
anyway!

original:
Just a minute, ^P!

I've become able to Digivolve into
^0!
'Huh'?! Is that all you've got to 
say...?!
Show some thanks, at least!
I can Digivolve at any time!
translation:
Just a minute, ^P!

I've become able to Digivolve into
^0!
'Huh'?! Is that all you've got to 
say...?!
Show some thanks, at least!
I can Digivolve at any time!

original:
I can Digivolve into all sorts of
Digimon right now♪
.........

What's with that lame reaction...?

Can't I at least get a standing
ovation?
Well, whatever, just being able to
Digivolve is good enough!
translation:
I can Digivolve into all sorts of
Digimon right now♪
.........

What's with that lame reaction...?

Can't I at least get a standing
ovation?
Well, whatever, just being able to
Digivolve is good enough!

original:
Hey, ^P,
look here...
I can't Digivolve into ANY Digimon
at the moment!
It'd be great if you could train me
a little more!
translation:
Hey, ^P,
look here...
I can't Digivolve into ANY Digimon
at the moment!
It'd be great if you could train me
a little more!

original:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Weakness'?
For example! Plant types are
weak to Fire attribute attacks!
You'll lose if you aren't careful 
about this kind of thing!
translation:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Weakness'?
For example! Plant types are
weak to Fire attribute attacks!
You'll lose if you aren't careful 
about this kind of thing!

original:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Resistance'?
For example! Dragon types are
strong to Fire attribute attacks!
You'll lose if you aren't careful 
about this kind of thing!
translation:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Resistance'?
For example! Dragon types are
strong to Fire attribute attacks!
You'll lose if you aren't careful 
about this kind of thing!

original:
I've got the skill 'Bulldoze'!

I'll smash any rock that dares
get in the way!
translation:
I've got the skill 'Bulldoze'!

I'll smash any rock that dares
get in the way!

original:
I've got the skill 'Ice Melt'!

I'll melt any ice block that dares
get in the way!
translation:
I've got the skill 'Ice Melt'!

I'll melt any ice block that dares
get in the way!

original:
I've got the skill 'Tree Cut'!

I'll cut any tree that dares
get in the way!
translation:
I've got the skill 'Tree Cut'!

I'll cut any tree that dares
get in the way!

original:
I've got the skill 'Dig'!

Be thankful to me, with this skill I
can dig paths into the earth!
translation:
I've got the skill 'Dig'!

Be thankful to me, with this skill I
can dig paths into the earth!

original:
I've got the skill 'Dive'!

Be thankful to me, with this skill I
can dive deep into the ocean!
translation:
I've got the skill 'Dive'!

Be thankful to me, with this skill I
can dive deep into the ocean!

original:
I don't have any skills.

Though I believe my beauty is
enough of a skill♪
translation:
I don't have any skills.

Though I believe my beauty is
enough of a skill♪

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our HP and MP.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our HP and MP.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our EXP.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our EXP.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Attack.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Attack.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Defense.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Defense.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Speed.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Speed.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Friendship.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with our Friendship.
I wonder what effect they'll have?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with making Weapons.
I wonder what weapons it'll make?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with making Weapons.
I wonder what weapons it'll make?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with making Armor.
I wonder what armor it'll make?
Maybe I should give it a try!
translation:
These new Farm Goods you've
placed here...
Looks like it's got something to
do with making Armor.
I wonder what armor it'll make?
Maybe I should give it a try!

original: Oh? Can I stop this job now?
translation: Oh? Can I stop this job now?

original:
Hmmm... Alright then.
I was getting a little tired.
translation:
Hmmm... Alright then.
I was getting a little tired.

original:
What's up with you?
Don't bother me, then!
translation:
What's up with you?
Don't bother me, then!

original:
Okay, got it. I'll start on this job
right away.
translation:
Okay, got it. I'll start on this job
right away.

original:
My! This DigiMeal is delicious♪
I feel so much better now!
translation:
My! This DigiMeal is delicious♪
I feel so much better now!

original:
That food was fine.
I feel a little better now.
translation:
That food was fine.
I feel a little better now.

original:
...Yuck! That was disgusting!
What the heck was that?!
translation:
...Yuck! That was disgusting!
What the heck was that?!

original:
Hmmm... Sorry, but I'm not
hungry at the moment.
translation:
Hmmm... Sorry, but I'm not
hungry at the moment.

original:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
Do you know which species
Gatomon belongs to?
translation:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
Do you know which species
Gatomon belongs to?

original: Seraph
translation: Seraph

original: Beast
translation: Beast

original:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.
translation:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.

original:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?
translation:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?

original:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
What is the command used in order
to make Equipment for Digimon?
translation:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
What is the command used in order
to make Equipment for Digimon?

original: Jobs
translation: Jobs

original: Training
translation: Training

original:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.
translation:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.

original:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?
translation:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?

original:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
What is the maximum amount of
Digimon
That can be in a single Farm
Island at one time?
translation:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
What is the maximum amount of
Digimon
That can be in a single Farm
Island at one time?

original: Up to 8
translation: Up to 8

original: Up to 10
translation: Up to 10

original:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.
translation:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.

original:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?
translation:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?

original:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
That Valkyriemon always has a 
bird with him,
Do you happen to know the name
of that bird?
translation:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to ask you something.
That Valkyriemon always has a 
bird with him,
Do you happen to know the name
of that bird?

original: It's Freya
translation: It's Freya

original: It's Blaze
translation: It's Blaze

original:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.
translation:
Yes, exactly correct!
I knew you'd get it right!
I'd like to give you a reward in
exchange for your correct answer.
Please keep up that knowledge.

original:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?
translation:
Hm? Oh my, I'm sorry but that's
not the right answer.
I'm asking you, ^P,

Could you please show a little more
interest in us next time?

original:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to discuss with you.
Lately I've been having difficulty
sleeping at night,
That makes everyday life during 
the day quite punishing.
Do you know of a way to
get a good night's sleep?
translation:
Sorry to bother you, but I'd like 
to discuss with you.
Lately I've been having difficulty
sleeping at night,
That makes everyday life during 
the day quite punishing.
Do you know of a way to
get a good night's sleep?

original: Exercise during the day!
translation: Exercise during the day!

original: Sleep while reading a book!
translation: Sleep while reading a book!

original:
Indeed... If I make my body get
exhausted during the day...
Then I should be able to get a
good night's sleep!
Thank you, ^P.
I will try this right away♪
translation:
Indeed... If I make my body get
exhausted during the day...
Then I should be able to get a
good night's sleep!
Thank you, ^P.
I will try this right away♪

original:
Sorry, but I've tried that method
several times already.
It's no use, I just end up reading
until the sun rises.
translation:
Sorry, but I've tried that method
several times already.
It's no use, I just end up reading
until the sun rises.

original:
Could you live without books,
^P?
I certainly couldn't.

If I have some spare time and
don't have anything to read,
My eyes will absentmindedly search
for something to read somewhere.
translation:
Could you live without books,
^P?
I certainly couldn't.

If I have some spare time and
don't have anything to read,
My eyes will absentmindedly search
for something to read somewhere.

original:
"His speech is as if it was 
translated from another language".
...Is what it says here.

In that case, should I be angry?
translation:
"His speech is as if it was 
translated from another language".
...Is what it says here.

In that case, should I be angry?

original:
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
I don't know why, but I can't get
these words out of my head.
Do you have this kind of
experience sometimes, too?
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
I was trying very hard to forget
just now, and yet...
translation:
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
I don't know why, but I can't get
these words out of my head.
Do you have this kind of
experience sometimes, too?
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
DigiWheat, DigiRice, DigiEggs.
I was trying very hard to forget
just now, and yet...

original:
When making an effort to live a life
without being angry,
Without being depraved, without
being discouraged,
Without lowering their head and
without forgetting to smile...
A passion of wanting to do
incredible things begins to flow
From deep inside ones heart...

...Right?
translation:
When making an effort to live a life
without being angry,
Without being depraved, without
being discouraged,
Without lowering their head and
without forgetting to smile...
A passion of wanting to do
incredible things begins to flow
From deep inside ones heart...

...Right?

original:
You always look so happy,
^P.
That happiness is infectious, even
I can't help but feel it.
.........

Though that comment seems a bit
pointless coming from me, huh.
translation:
You always look so happy,
^P.
That happiness is infectious, even
I can't help but feel it.
.........

Though that comment seems a bit
pointless coming from me, huh.

original:
Oh my, ^P, what's wrong?
Did something happen?
You look lost...

...Forgive me if there's been some
sort of misunderstanding.
translation:
Oh my, ^P, what's wrong?
Did something happen?
You look lost...

...Forgive me if there's been some
sort of misunderstanding.

original:
Say, ^P, do you believe
in fortune telling?
I, of course, don't believe it in
the slightest.
Fortune Telling, Incantation,
Curses, Exorcism... 
I don't believe any of them.

...Though part of me believes in
rainmaking rituals... just a little.
translation:
Say, ^P, do you believe
in fortune telling?
I, of course, don't believe it in
the slightest.
Fortune Telling, Incantation,
Curses, Exorcism... 
I don't believe any of them.

...Though part of me believes in
rainmaking rituals... just a little.

original:
^P♪

No, it's nothing.
Don't mind me!
translation:
^P♪

No, it's nothing.
Don't mind me!

original:
It's not about one's outward
appearance, but also their heart.
That's not mere lip service,
it's the truth.
The outermost layer of the heart
is one's appearance.
There's not a single person that's 
just beautiful in heart,
but ugly in appearance.
The reverse is also the same.
Whether you like it or not, 
that's just the truth.
Can you understand me?
translation:
It's not about one's outward
appearance, but also their heart.
That's not mere lip service,
it's the truth.
The outermost layer of the heart
is one's appearance.
There's not a single person that's 
just beautiful in heart,
but ugly in appearance.
The reverse is also the same.
Whether you like it or not, 
that's just the truth.
Can you understand me?

original:
It's nice to go outside once in a
while for a change of pace.
Could you bring me along, too,
someday?
translation:
It's nice to go outside once in a
while for a change of pace.
Could you bring me along, too,
someday?

original:
^P's name...
It's a perfect fit!♪
It really fits perfectly together
with their appearance...
...Speaking of, that made me
remember something.
A long time ago, there was a
Gabumon with a strict Tamer.
Gabumon was given the 
nickname 'Mackeral'...
He felt pretty disheartened
by such a nickname...
translation:
^P's name...
It's a perfect fit!♪
It really fits perfectly together
with their appearance...
...Speaking of, that made me
remember something.
A long time ago, there was a
Gabumon with a strict Tamer.
Gabumon was given the 
nickname 'Mackeral'...
He felt pretty disheartened
by such a nickname...

original:
Do you ever feel curious... 
About what kinds of Farm Islands
other Tamers build?
You can get an idea of their
personalities from various points,
Such as...
The name of the Island.
translation:
Do you ever feel curious... 
About what kinds of Farm Islands
other Tamers build?
You can get an idea of their
personalities from various points,
Such as...
The name of the Island.

original:
^P, do you enjoy tea?

If it's alright with you, next time
why don't we have some DigiTea?
With some DigiCake, DigiScones,
DigiMilk, and DigiCucumber 
Sandwiches?
translation:
^P, do you enjoy tea?

If it's alright with you, next time
why don't we have some DigiTea?
With some DigiCake, DigiScones,
DigiMilk, and DigiCucumber 
Sandwiches?

original:
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
...Have you heard about the
'Gestaltzerfall'...?
No, it's nothing.
Please forget what I just said.
translation:
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digivolution, Degeneration,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
Digiv o l u t i o n, Degene r a t i o n,
...Have you heard about the
'Gestaltzerfall'...?
No, it's nothing.
Please forget what I just said.

original:
Oh, are you taking a look around,
^P?
Everything's in order.
Thank you for your concern.
translation:
Oh, are you taking a look around,
^P?
Everything's in order.
Thank you for your concern.

original:
I'm Agumon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
I may look like a dinosaur, but 
that's absolutely wrong.
I want to get stronger, so please
guide me♪
translation:
I'm Agumon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon!
I may look like a dinosaur, but 
that's absolutely wrong.
I want to get stronger, so please
guide me♪

original:
I'm Veemon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon.
Let's hurry and go on adventures
together. I can't wait.
translation:
I'm Veemon, a dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon.
Let's hurry and go on adventures
together. I can't wait.

original:
I'm Guilmon, a dark dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon.
My sharp claws are quite useful
during battle.
Let me participate in battle and
I'll show you properly...♪
translation:
I'm Guilmon, a dark dragon type
Mythical Beast species Digimon.
My sharp claws are quite useful
during battle.
Let me participate in battle and
I'll show you properly...♪

original:
I'm Dorumon, a beast dragon 
type Mythical Beast species Digimon.
I can use my claws to dig holes
into the earth.
I can take you anywhere you need
to go with them♪
translation:
I'm Dorumon, a beast dragon 
type Mythical Beast species Digimon.
I can use my claws to dig holes
into the earth.
I can take you anywhere you need
to go with them♪

original:
I'm Patamon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon.
I may look weak at first...
But I'll grow stronger.
You just have to trust me.
translation:
I'm Patamon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon.
I may look weak at first...
But I'll grow stronger.
You just have to trust me.

original:
I'm Biyomon, a wing type
bird species Digimon.
I'd like to soar high in the sky
someday.
So please take me all over the
place♪
translation:
I'm Biyomon, a wing type
bird species Digimon.
I'd like to soar high in the sky
someday.
So please take me all over the
place♪

original:
I'm Palmon, a plant type
plant species Digimon.
I'm sure you'll come to like the
flower upon my head.
I look forward to going on plenty
of adventures with everyone.
translation:
I'm Palmon, a plant type
plant species Digimon.
I'm sure you'll come to like the
flower upon my head.
I look forward to going on plenty
of adventures with everyone.

original:
I'm Tentomon, a insect type
bug species Digimon.
I truly do love nature.

But I think I've come to like this
Farm just as much♪
translation:
I'm Tentomon, a insect type
bug species Digimon.
I truly do love nature.

But I think I've come to like this
Farm just as much♪

original:
I'm Gomamon, an ice water 
type beast species Digimon.
I'm pretty talented at diving♪
Let's go on all sorts of adventures
together, okay?
translation:
I'm Gomamon, an ice water 
type beast species Digimon.
I'm pretty talented at diving♪
Let's go on all sorts of adventures
together, okay?

original:
I'm Terriermon, a animal type
beast species Digimon.
I may not look it, but I'm actually
incredibly strong.
So be sure to take me on many
grand adventures♪
translation:
I'm Terriermon, a animal type
beast species Digimon.
I may not look it, but I'm actually
incredibly strong.
So be sure to take me on many
grand adventures♪

original:
I'm Renamon, a dark type
beast species Digimon.
I take pride in my speed, I can't
even be seen by the naked eye.
I hope we can go on adventures
together, soon♪
translation:
I'm Renamon, a dark type
beast species Digimon.
I take pride in my speed, I can't
even be seen by the naked eye.
I hope we can go on adventures
together, soon♪

original:
I'm Coronamon, a flame type
beast species Digimon.
I specialize in flame-based
techniques♪
I'm curious to see what'll happen
from here on...
translation:
I'm Coronamon, a flame type
beast species Digimon.
I specialize in flame-based
techniques♪
I'm curious to see what'll happen
from here on...

original:
I'm Lunamon, an ice water type
beast species Digimon.
I specialize in water-based
techniques♪
I'm excited to see what'll happen
from here on!
translation:
I'm Lunamon, an ice water type
beast species Digimon.
I specialize in water-based
techniques♪
I'm excited to see what'll happen
from here on!

original:
I'm Gatomon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon.
While I do quite enjoy this Farm
Island,
Please hurry and bring me out on
adventures, soon!
translation:
I'm Gatomon, a sacred beast 
type seraph species Digimon.
While I do quite enjoy this Farm
Island,
Please hurry and bring me out on
adventures, soon!

original:
I'm WarGreymon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

I'm only going to get stronger and
stronger!
I'm always ready for battle!
translation:
I'm WarGreymon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

I'm only going to get stronger and
stronger!
I'm always ready for battle!

original:
I'm MetalGarurumon, a metal
beast type 
beast species Digimon.

I must continue to get stronger
and stronger♪
In order to do that, you must take
me on various adventures.
translation:
I'm MetalGarurumon, a metal
beast type 
beast species Digimon.

I must continue to get stronger
and stronger♪
In order to do that, you must take
me on various adventures.

original:
I'm Gallantmon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

Just watch, I'm going to get
stronger and stronger.
So be sure to take me on all sorts
of adventures!
translation:
I'm Gallantmon, a dragon 
warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

Just watch, I'm going to get
stronger and stronger.
So be sure to take me on all sorts
of adventures!

original:
I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon.
We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.
translation:
I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon.
We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.

original:
I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.
translation:
I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.

original:
I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.
translation:
I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.

original:
I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.
translation:
I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
Mythical Beast species Digimon.

We finally meet, ^P!

I'm so very happy!
Let's work hard together.

original:
I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon.

As this Farm Island continues to
grow bigger,
I'll be sure to do my very best to
make myself useful.
translation:
I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon.

As this Farm Island continues to
grow bigger,
I'll be sure to do my very best to
make myself useful.

original:
Are you angry or something,
^P?
You always have such a scary
expression,
It makes it hard for me to talk
to you.
translation:
Are you angry or something,
^P?
You always have such a scary
expression,
It makes it hard for me to talk
to you.

original:
You don't seem to have any 
interest in me, ^P.
Not that I mind, of course.
translation:
You don't seem to have any 
interest in me, ^P.
Not that I mind, of course.

original:
Have you been especially busy
recently, ^P...?
Hm? Oh, well...
It's nothing, don't worry about it.
translation:
Have you been especially busy
recently, ^P...?
Hm? Oh, well...
It's nothing, don't worry about it.

original:
You seem a lot happier recently,
^P!
I'm also happy whenever you're
here with me♪
translation:
You seem a lot happier recently,
^P!
I'm also happy whenever you're
here with me♪

original:
I'm so happy that you're my
Tamer, ^P♪
I'm so glad I met you!
translation:
I'm so happy that you're my
Tamer, ^P♪
I'm so glad I met you!

original:
Could you please listen to my
request, ^P?
Regardless of what shape I may
take in the future...
Please be my Tamer forever.
translation:
Could you please listen to my
request, ^P?
Regardless of what shape I may
take in the future...
Please be my Tamer forever.

original:
^P, you've played this
game for about...
^0 hours and ^1 minutes!

I hope you can keep up the great
work♪
translation:
^P, you've played this
game for about...
^0 hours and ^1 minutes!

I hope you can keep up the great
work♪

original:
^P, you've currently
set about...
^0% of all DigiPlates!

I'm very grateful for the number
of plates you've collected♪
translation:
^P, you've currently
set about...
^0% of all DigiPlates!

I'm very grateful for the number
of plates you've collected♪

original:
Um, ^P...
Well, you see,
I'm actually able to Digivolve into
^0 right now!
So feel free to Digivolve me
whenever you want♪
translation:
Um, ^P...
Well, you see,
I'm actually able to Digivolve into
^0 right now!
So feel free to Digivolve me
whenever you want♪

original:
Um, ^P!
Suddenly before I realized it,
It looks like I'm able to Digivolve
into many different Digimon♪
So please Digivolve me into 
whichever Digimon you desire!
translation:
Um, ^P!
Suddenly before I realized it,
It looks like I'm able to Digivolve
into many different Digimon♪
So please Digivolve me into 
whichever Digimon you desire!

original:
...^P...
Right now, I...
I'm unable to Digivolve into any
Digimon, none at all...
So please!
Train me even harder!
We can't just stay like this!
translation:
...^P...
Right now, I...
I'm unable to Digivolve into any
Digimon, none at all...
So please!
Train me even harder!
We can't just stay like this!

original:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Weakness'?
For example! Beast types are
weak to Water attribute attacks.
Take these into consideration when
you're battling, okay?
translation:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Weakness'?
For example! Beast types are
weak to Water attribute attacks.
Take these into consideration when
you're battling, okay?

original:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Resistance'?
For example! Bird types are
strong to Light attribute attacks.
Take these into consideration when
you're battling, okay?
translation:
Did you know every Digimon has
a 'Resistance'?
For example! Bird types are
strong to Light attribute attacks.
Take these into consideration when
you're battling, okay?

original:
I have the skill 'Bulldoze'.

I'll smash any rock that's in the 
way.
translation:
I have the skill 'Bulldoze'.

I'll smash any rock that's in the 
way.

original:
I have the skill 'Ice Melt'.

I'll melt any ice blocks in the way.
translation:
I have the skill 'Ice Melt'.

I'll melt any ice blocks in the way.

original:
I have the skill 'Tree Cut'.

I'll slice down any tree in the way.
translation:
I have the skill 'Tree Cut'.

I'll slice down any tree in the way.

original:
I have the skill 'Dig'.

I can travel through the earth
to find new locations.
translation:
I have the skill 'Dig'.

I can travel through the earth
to find new locations.

original:
I have the skill 'Dive'.

I can dive through the water
to find new locations.
translation:
I have the skill 'Dive'.

I can dive through the water
to find new locations.
